com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.task.util
Class TaskManager

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.unit.Manager
      com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.task.util.TaskManager

public class TaskManager
extends Manager

TaskManager is a Manager that is responsible for handling all ITask generated by packets received from the server. TaskManager is constructed by the Game at during initialization of the system.

TaskManager is updated by Game during main game update/render loop to execute all the buffered ITask.

TaskManager executes the buffered ITask in the order in which they are generated and buffered. This means the ITask generated first will be executed first before other ITask generated later.

During one single update cycle, TaskManager tries to execute as many buffered ITask as possible. However, it may not execute all the ITask if the total execution time exceeds the allowed maximum limit. The left over ITask is then put on top of the queue and will be executed first during the next update cycle.

TaskManager automatically submits the newly created ITask. When a new RealTimeTask is created, TaskManager automatically discards the older version of the task that is considered 'equal' to the newly added one. This guarantees that there is only the newest version of the same RealTimeTask in the task queue.

Version:
Creation date: 06-02-2008 14:40 EST, Modified date: 08-14-2008 16:30 EST
Author:
Yi Wang (Neakor)

submit

public boolean submit(ITask task)
Submit the given task to the TaskManager for later execution. However, there is no guarantee that the given task will be enqueued.

Parameters:
task - The ITask to be submitted.
Returns:
True if the task is successfully submitted.
